author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA EXPECTED TO BRING CATASTROPHIC WINDS, FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA TODAY...
summary: ...MELISSA EXPECTED TO BRING CATASTROPHIC WINDS, FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA TODAY... As of 2:00 AM EDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Melissa was located near 16.8, -78.4 with movement NNE at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 901 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 175 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA EXPECTED TO BRING CATASTROPHIC WINDS, FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA TODAY... As of 2:00 AM EDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Melissa was located near 16.8, -78.4 with movement NNE at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 901 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 175 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
